name: Sayani
greetingText: I always thought happiness started with an 'h'. But it turns out mine starts with 'u'
wishText:
Nazre jhuka kar jab muskurati ho to kamal lagti ho,Koi puche mujhse ishq ke bare me to uska jawab lagti ho,Itne tarooon ke bich jo chand rehta hai na,bas tum vahi chand lagti ho,
Rat ka khubsurat khwab Or subah ka pehla khayal lagti ho
